effect.diamond_pearl: The user’s original Attack and Defense are swapped. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.platinum: The user’s original Attack and Defense are swapped. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: The user’s original Attack and Defense are swapped. This effect is passed on by baton pass.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack with its Defense stat.
flavor_text.platinum: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack with its Defense stat.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack with its Defense stat.
